A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: While there are scenes and characters in this movie that made little to no sense (The code breaker definitely. Rose and Holdo to an extent) there are still many great moments in this film that are visually stunning and add more depth to the star wars cannon. The performances are great all around and the Rey Luke and Kylo scenes are well done. This film takes risks that backfire\, but some of them stick a perfect landing!
